solution_line_template: Ruel has a total of {num_books_10} x {stamps_per_book_10} = <<{num_books_10}*{stamps_per_book_10}={stamps_from_10}>>{stamps_from_10} stamps from the four books.
He also has {num_books_15} x {stamps_per_book_15} = <<{num_books_15}*{stamps_per_book_15}={stamps_from_15}>>{stamps_from_15} stamps from the six books.
Therefore, he has a total of {stamps_from_10} + {stamps_from_15} = <<{stamps_from_10}+{stamps_from_15}={total_stamps}>>{total_stamps} stamps.
